metadata.name: Dancing in the Rain
metadata.description:
Bwindi Impenetrable Forest is home to the endangered Mountain Gorillas, rare bird species, local Batwa tribe and the communities which protect it all. This Project aims to raise awareness through visual storytelling and financially aid the communities that have been struggling as a result of low tourism, following the Covid-19 Pandemic.
 
100% of ALL NET Profits will be donated to local Gorilla conservation, rangers, and community projects to rebuild and support the specific communities that have devotedly been protecting this natural gem for decades. 

For  more information on this exciting project please go to www.bwindinft.com
